meanings.definition: A low-calorie artificial sweetener used in food and beverages.
meanings.sent1: Aspartames are commonly found in sugar-free drinks.
meanings.sent2: I added some aspartames to my coffee to make it sweeter.
meanings.sent3: The aspartames in the cake made it taste like a cloud of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as aspartames, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The aspartames sparkled like tiny crystals in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: We bought two packets of aspartames for the party.
meanings.sent2: The store had different brands of aspartames on sale.
meanings.sent3: The aspartames on the shelf looked like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The aspartames in the bowl were a sea of tiny granules.
meanings.sent5: The aspartames overflowed from the container, creating a sweet mess.
